title: S&M
description: Please It has come to my attention that S&M is being stolen by Nene King, Sasha Stark, and Daniel Newheart. I'm pretty sure this is the same person/corporation. Please do not purchase those books. I have also submitted a claim of copyright infringement against all books and parties. I have ONLY published the S&M books under Vera Roberts and will continue to do so. Mariana Harlow discovered a kinky secret about her boss, Scott Reed, one day while she cleaned his home. When Scott catches her snooping, he gives her a punishment that opens the doors to the delicious world of BDSM.
author: Vera Roberts
